title: From FOMO to JOMO: Examining the Fear and Joy of Missing Out and Presence in a 360° Video Viewing Experience
authors: Tanja Aitamurto; Andrea Stevenson; Won Sukolsak Sakshuwong; Byungdoo Kim; Yasamin Sadeghi; Krysten Stein; Peter Royal; Catherine Lynn Kircos; Andrea Stevenson Won; Sukolsak Sakshuwong; Catherine Lynn
